title: How to Convert Text to PDF: Create Professional Documents from Plain Text
content:
## Introduction

Converting plain text to PDF creates professional, shareable documents that maintain consistent formatting across all devices. Our free Text to PDF converter lets you transform simple text into polished PDF documents with customizable fonts, margins, and page layouts.

## Key Takeaways

- Convert plain text to formatted PDF documents
- Customize fonts, sizes, and margins
- Choose page size and orientation
- Create multi-page documents automatically
- Download professional-quality PDFs instantly

## What is Text to PDF Conversion?

Text to PDF conversion takes unformatted plain text and wraps it in the PDF document format with proper page structure, fonts, and formatting. The result is a professional document that:

- Displays consistently everywhere
- Can be printed reliably
- Is easy to share and store
- Looks more professional than plain text

## Why Convert Text to PDF?

### 1. Professional Presentation

Transform casual text into formal documents:
- Reports and memos
- Letters and correspondence
- Proposals and quotes
- Meeting notes and minutes

### 2. Consistent Formatting

PDF maintains appearance across platforms:
- Same look on any device
- Fonts embedded in document
- No formatting shifts
- Print-ready output

### 3. Easy Distribution

Simplify document sharing:
- Universal PDF support
- No software requirements for viewing
- Smaller than word processor files
- Email-friendly format

### 4. Document Preservation

Create lasting records:
- Archive text content
- Preserve formatting long-term
- Create backup copies
- Maintain version history

## Common Use Cases

### Code and Scripts

Document code for sharing:
- Source code printouts
- Configuration files
- Log files
- Script documentation

### Notes and Documentation

Convert notes to formal documents:
- Meeting minutes
- Research notes
- Process documentation
- Knowledge base articles

### Creative Writing

Prepare manuscripts:
- Story drafts
- Poetry collections
- Article submissions
- Ebook preparation

### Business Communication

Create professional correspondence:
- Formal letters
- Contracts and agreements
- Policies and procedures
- Employee communications

## Step-by-Step Guide

### Step 1: Enter Your Text

Type or paste your text into the input area. The tool accepts:
- Plain text from any source
- Multiple paragraphs
- Lists and structured content
- Special characters and symbols

### Step 2: Customize Appearance

**Font Settings:**
- Font family (serif, sans-serif, monospace)
- Font size (typically 10-14pt for body text)
- Line spacing (single, 1.5, double)

**Page Settings:**
- Page size (A4, Letter, Legal)
- Orientation (portrait, landscape)
- Margins (standard, narrow, wide)

### Step 3: Preview

Review how your document will look before generating the PDF.

### Step 4: Generate and Download

Click Generate PDF to create your document. Download the finished PDF file.

## Features and Capabilities

### Font Options

| Font Type | Best For |
|-----------|----------|
| Serif (Times) | Formal documents, long reading |
| Sans-serif (Arial) | Modern documents, clarity |
| Monospace (Courier) | Code, technical documents |

### Page Sizes

| Size | Dimensions | Region |
|------|------------|--------|
| A4 | 210 x 297 mm | International |
| Letter | 8.5 x 11 in | US, Canada |
| Legal | 8.5 x 14 in | Legal documents |

### Margin Options

- **Standard**: 1 inch / 2.54 cm all around
- **Narrow**: 0.5 inch for more content
- **Wide**: 1.5 inch for annotations
- **Custom**: Set each margin individually

## Best Practices and Tips

### Text Preparation

**Before converting:**
- Check spelling and grammar
- Add paragraph breaks where needed
- Use consistent formatting
- Remove extra blank lines

### Font Selection

**For readability:**
- Body text: 11-12pt
- Code/technical: 10pt monospace
- Titles: 14-18pt
- Line spacing: 1.15-1.5 for body

### Layout Considerations

| Content Type | Recommended Settings |
|--------------|---------------------|
| Letters | Portrait, standard margins, serif |
| Code | Landscape, narrow margins, monospace |
| Reports | Portrait, standard margins, sans-serif |
| Notes | Portrait, narrow margins, any font |

### Improving Readability

1. Use appropriate line spacing
2. Keep reasonable margins
3. Choose readable font sizes
4. Consider your audience and purpose
5. Add headers for long documents

## Formatting Tips

### Creating Structure

Without rich formatting, use text conventions:

```
HEADING
=======

Subheading
----------

- Bullet point
- Another point

1. Numbered item
2. Second item
```

### Handling Long Documents

- Break into logical sections
- Use blank lines between paragraphs
- Consider page breaks for chapters
- Preview before final conversion

### Code Formatting

- Use monospace font
- Preserve indentation
- Consider landscape for wide code
- Use smaller font size (9-10pt)

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Can I add images to my text PDF?

This tool converts plain text only. For documents with images, use our Image to PDF converter or a word processor.

### Will my text wrap to multiple pages?

Yes, the tool automatically creates multiple pages as needed. Text flows naturally across page boundaries.

### Can I create headers and footers?

Basic header/footer options may be available. For complex headers and footers, consider using a word processor.

### What happens to special characters?

Unicode characters are supported and will appear correctly in the PDF. This includes accented letters, symbols, and many language scripts.

### Can I password-protect the PDF?

The basic conversion does not include password protection. Use PDF editing software to add security after download.

### Is there a text length limit?

There is no strict character limit, but very long documents may take more time to process. The tool handles multi-page documents well.

## Conclusion

Converting text to PDF transforms simple content into professional, shareable documents. Our free Text to PDF converter provides the customization options you need while keeping the process simple and fast.

Create polished PDF documents from your text content today.
